name: Invest in this!
description:
A game where you need to avoid the entrepreneurs so that they don't convince you to invest into their products.

Important: To get the correct resolution size you need to scroll down to the bottom  right and click the fullscreen button.

The controls are: W to jump, A and D to move left and right.

Use your cursor to buy items from the shop

This is a game for the BenBonk game jam #1.
